transcript:
to his pleasures. He spent the greater part of his time away from home, at dinners, parties, and balls. 
ON THE THIRD DAY after Christmas Nicholas dined at home, a thing he had rarely done of late. It was a grand farewell dinner, as he and Denfsov were leaving to join their regiment after Epiphany. About twenty people were present, including D61okhov and Denfsov.
